DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Asia, Europe and in the United States of America. The aim of this study is to examine patient and physician beliefs regarding insulin therapy and the degree to which patients adhere to their insulin regimens.
DOC.brief_title: GAPP 1 Survey: Global Attitudes of Patients and Physicians in Insulin Therapy for Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: PATIENTS WITH DIABETES: Age 18 years or older Treated with insulin Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes PHYSICIANS: In practice for more than 1 year since completing residency See a minimum number of patients with diabetes per week (primary care physicians 5, specialists 10) Initiate insulin treatment for patients with diabetes
